titleStmt.title: Wisdom justified of her children, or, Two sermons sometime preached in Cockshutt Chappel, in the county of Salop, and lately at Brightling in Sussex, on Matth. XI. XIX. and now at the request of friends enlarged, and published / by William Gearing ...
titleStmt.author: Gearing, William.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
